Name: Access Server Options from Configuration Menu
Description: Navigate to the configuration page, access server options from the menu, and return to the home page to verify successful navigation.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /config
Step 2: Click on button menu
Step 3: Click on link serverOptions -> Navigate to page '/config/server-options'
Step 4: Click on header serverOptions -> Navigate to page ''
Step 5: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Access Goc Nhin Page and Verify
Description: Begin at the home page, click the Goc Nhin link, and verify that the Goc Nhin page is displayed correctly.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link gocNhin -> Navigate to page '/goc-nhin'
Step 3: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint

Name: Navigate through Dynamic Links and Verify Home Page
Description: Start at the home page, click various dynamic links, navigate to business and property details, and verify the home page.
Test Steps:
Step 1: Navigate to /
Step 2: Click on link dynamicObject (viewDetails) -> Navigate to page '/*'
Step 3: Click on link business -> Navigate to page '/kinh-doanh'
Step 4: Click on link propertyDetails -> Navigate to page '/*'
Step 5: Click on link vnExpress -> Navigate to page '/'
Step 6: Click on link dynamicObject (thuTuongNghienCuu) -> Navigate to page '/*'
Step 7: Take full page screenshot as checkpoint
